is_int32: This function returns whether a given variable is a 323bit integer or not. In some cases you want to check and see what data type a variable holds in GameMaker Studio 2 and that's when you would use this function. It returns <tt>true</tt> or <tt>false</tt> depending on whether the value is an int 32 or not.
The above code checks the variable "val" to see if it contains an int32 and if it is not then it shows a message in the debug console.
